title: Raw Session Schema
description: Schema validation for the Raw Session structure input to the Preparation System

tweet.description: The text content of the tweet

audio_data.description: File path to the associated audio file

timestamp.description: Time in seconds when the event occurred

event.description: Name or description of the event (e.g., goal, foul)

label.description: Classification label (e.g., cyberbullying). Can be null if in production phase.
